DOC.brief_summary: To investigate if electronic reporting of patient reported outcome measures from home is comparable to the traditional touch-screen solution to hospital among patients with rheumatoid arthritis and axial spondyloarthritis
DOC.brief_title: Patient Reported Outcomes Reported Via PC / Tablet Home Versus Touch Screen at Hospital Among Patients With Arthritis
